website_summaries.verdict: An excellent exfoliating bodywash even for those with sensitive skin.
pros: Exfoliates with salicylic acid, which improves bumpy skin and acne
Leaves skin very moisturized without clogging pores
cons: Salicylic acid can make your skin sensitive to the sun, so make sure to wear sunblock when using

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of my KP bumps in days
customer_reviews.text: I use this with the cerave SA body lotion. Works in days to get rid of the ingrown hair bumps iget on my butt, backs of my thighs and backs of my arms. This is truly scent and fragrance free! My skin is extremely sensitive. I carefully followed the instructions and this did not irritate my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works well for all body acne!
customer_reviews.text: I had horrible butt acne and it was so embarrassing. I went to a doctor and the products she recommended didn’t work- but this did. But this is amazing, the bottle lasted almost 2 months and I used a quarter size everyday.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Wooowwwww!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I have had bumps on the back of my arms and top of my thighs for as long as I can remember. I've used this with a exfoliating sponge TWICE and they are noticeably smaller and my arms actually feel smooth!! I'm sure as I continue to use it they will be gone completely. I rarely write reviews but had to come tell you all how awesome this stuff is if you are dealing with the same problems. NO MORE CHICKEN SKIN!! YAYY
customer_reviews.author: Taymcg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best body wash I’ve ever used. I have horrible skin. Though it hasn’t cleared up my back acne as other reviewers have mentioned, it does leave my skin so soft and doesn’t cause any reactions. I cannot use any other body wash. In the past month I’ve spent over $30 alone on body wash, even tried those who claim to be organic and for sensitive skin. They all cause me to rash all over. I will definitely be using this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha

customer_reviews.title: I've honestly noticed no difference in my keratosis pilaris

I'm giving it 2 stars cause it's a decent wash for sensitive skin but it did not do it's job at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive for the amount.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Cerave, but i do feel like for the price they can include a little more. I use this only on my ingrown hair because its so small, I feel like i have to use it wisely. Haven't used it enough to see results, but I know Cerave is great for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dead Skin Buildup and Acne Prone Body
customer_reviews.text: I for years, have had issues with bacne, chest, and shoulder acne. After the acne cleared up, I still had issues with dead skin buildup to where I would scratch my chest or back and I’d have a gross layer of gray/whiteish dead skin under my nails and these areas felt rough and bumpy. I began using this combined with the CeraVe Moisturizing cream with every shower (every other day) and the issue literally vanished within a month. A 10+ years long issue, resolved in less than a month! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Moore

customer_reviews.title: No change after a month of use - don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from keratosis pilaris on my upper arms and I decided to try this brand after reading reviews. Unfortunately, I used this shower gel and the lotion every day for almost a month and there’s been no change. It’s so embarrassing and I hate to wear tank tops or tshirts. I was so disappointed in this brand and I won’t be buying Cerave again. Don’t waste your money, it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Hallock

customer_reviews.title: Corn Oil
customer_reviews.text: This product has corn oil which clogs acne prone skin. I tried it without realizing it had corn oil in it and now my skin is breaking out.
customer_reviews.author: ascoboria

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this using this with the lotion for about a week. I have keratin build up on my arms and thighs. This is making the bumps much smaller and the redness is completely gone! I’ve had these bumps since I was a teenager. It’s so amazing to see a big difference in my skin now in my mid 20s!
customer_reviews.author: angel stoute

customer_reviews.title: Thick, gel consistency and not overly drying.
customer_reviews.text: This is helping to clear up my back acne. The formula is thick like a gel so it stays in place in the shower and gives you time to rub it in and spread it around before the water washes it away. It’s not overly drying so you don’t get that tight, itchy skin feeling after you dry off. It’s super hot outside right now so couple that with sweating from just being outside, that makes the perfect condition for irritated skin that can breakout but this is keeping things in check. Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Little Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Good price

He prescribed a cream that would have cost $50 with my insurance so I decided to see what I could find over the counter for a better price. This lotion has most of the same ingredients at a fraction of the cost (no prescription needed either) couple days of use and I do notice slight improvement. Certainly not as strong as the prescribed one but for what I save it’s not bad
customer_reviews.author: Meena

customer_reviews.title: Great sensitive wash!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is just after day one, my bumps seem to have gone down, and are disappearing... so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cleared up those pesky arm bumps!

She said that many of her patients have had a positive result with this combo instead of using a pricey prescription medication and I couldn't believe how fast the bumps went away! I am so extremely happy that something I have been fighting for years is gone! There isn't really a scent with it and I don't think it would be appropriate for more sensitive skin but for acne prone areas on the body it's amazing!

I kind of feel i have to add a lot of product... And 10 ounces? Please create a bigger size, like 32 oz. I just got my new silicone body scrubber today. Maybe it'd help. I still do recommend this body wash. Update- the silicone scrubber didnt help. 🤦‍♀️

This has been a life saver for me and I recommend it to everyone. It does take a few weeks to really take effect, and you have to be consistent. But it really does work!
customer_reviews.author: Adriene McInerny

customer_reviews.title: Great, will buy again.

I am currently not using it anymore and I'll see how this body wash helps clear that up. it's definitely got its work cut out for it because these bumps are so painful and so inflamed. 😭

As a disclaimer, I need to add that after I use the body wash and before the lotion, I use Olay in-shower lotion before rinsing off. I'm not sure if that makes a difference, but the combination is everything! Try it.

customer_reviews.author: Eric kirchmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and it was everywhere. It was packaged with two $100 dollar books I bought for my coffee table and the soap was all over them. Livid is an understatement
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey miller

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't really worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over 2 months and have not really seen any improvement. I will keep using up what I have, but I don't have high hopes. Really disappointed because there are so many great reviews, but obviously I am one of the unlucky few that this product has no effect.
customer_reviews.author: UgaAli08

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKSSSS!!
customer_reviews.text: Ya’lllllllll let me tell you. This stuff really works. I have been using it for about 2 weeks and it’s helped me tons just with little time. I bought it mostly because I have ingrown hairs and blackheads on my thighs and under my armpits and they’re going away. I definitely recommend. I know it’s a little expensive for a body wash but it definitely worth it. Please give it try if you want that beautiful smooth skin.
customer_reviews.author: marina

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure...
customer_reviews.text: I have “chicken skin” on the backs of my arms so I was hoping this would help. I’m almost done with the bottle and I haven’t noticed any huge improvement, maybe just a little. I don’t think I will continue to use when it’s done. I also prefer to use body washes with a little scent so I will continue to use EO body wash. This body wash does lather Nicely though.
customer_reviews.author: jnun7

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: I hate having any kind of rough or bumpy skin. I've done daily lotions, in shower moisturizers and nothing has worked as well as this. After the first use, I definitely noticed my skin felt softer and smoother. Will be buying again and again. Another product from CeraVe that does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Raine Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Great when used consistently!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars only because of the size of the bottle. I honestly wish it was larger. On the brighter side, this is the first body wash I’ve used that actually cleared up my skin. I used to have acne on my arms and back and this wash has basically cleared it all up. Consistency is key tho, I got impatient when I just bought it and stopped using it but i decided to give it a next go and I have not regretted it since.
customer_reviews.author: Reason

customer_reviews.title: The product leaked
customer_reviews.text: This product was used by my son for acne on back and arms. It really helps. My problem with this delivery was the packaging. It had leaked quite a bit. It was inside a plastic bag but the bag doesn’t completely seal so it also leaked in the box. Easily lost about 3 tablespoons. I would return it but it is so hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Anvil

customer_reviews.title: like this brand
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and I like this brand. Their face wash is pretty much the only face wash I can tolerate! This body wash was OK, it was a little pricey and I didn't notice much of a difference in my skin. but I didn't have any issues or irritation either
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This has very little scent. Used it every day for a while and noticed a huge difference in the bumps on my arms from KP. I also tend to be very red on my arms where my bumps are( sometimes purple tinted when I’m extra pale and cold) and it didn’t completely take this away( KP isn’t totally to blame for this as I have lupus and rarely am not red somewhere on my body.) Simple to use and you don’t have to scrub and irritate your skin further.
customer_reviews.author: KaSchma

customer_reviews.title: Good for keratosis pilaris
customer_reviews.text: This works great for their keratosis pilaris on my arms, I use it once or twice a week and saw results after about a week or two, a month or two later and it was completely gone. It’s unscented which I prefer, and I have sensitive skin and was completely fine using this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I have had body acne on my arms since I was probably around 8 years old. During my teen years, I had tried everything to get rid of it, but ultimately gave up. Now that I’m getting married soon, I wanted to try again. Three days. Three days was all it took to completely clear up the acne on one of my arms, with the other arm noticeably less red, less bumpy, and much smoother. I am amazed and have already sent a link to 4 people to try this.
customer_reviews.author: Beth_Marti

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR KP! STAY CONSISTENT!!
customer_reviews.text: enjoyed this body wash and how well it helped treat my KP. However, this alone is not effective enough to erase ALL bumps, only 75%. also, you must be consistent with this body wash to see results. If I skipped a day or two from using this, my KP would be noticeable and more pronounced. after using this wash with my cleansing cloth I get SMOOTH SKIN and immediately after I use an AHA glycolic body lotion to further the exfoliation will be ordering again! 🌀
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Prelim Review
customer_reviews.text: Preliminary review only, then more details after use tonight. Then, final review on efficacy after a few wks. No detectable scent in bottle. YMMV since I use nasal spray chronically. Size was surprising. This bottle is barely larger than a Coke can.
customer_reviews.author: isaidso

customer_reviews.title: 95% cured my KP!
customer_reviews.text: I've had KP since puberty (I'm 37) and tried EVERYTHING on the market as well as prescribed by my dermatologist. Seriously - everything!! This and the corresponding cream are the best there is out there. Period. I've tried the lotion as well but for me it's not as effective as the cream.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: I hope they start making it in a larger size! I first got it for my son who had goose flesh (KP). By the end of the week it, the back of his arms was smooth! I actually started using it myself for dry winter skin and before self tanner application and it works wonders!!
customer_reviews.author: MerMama2020

customer_reviews.title: Rough bumpy arms gone
customer_reviews.text: I've had rough bumpy skin on the back of my arms forever. I started using this right after I use Koji San Kojic Acid soap maybe once very 2 weeks and the bumps are gone. I thought I die with them lol. If used daily I'm sure I would've seen results quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Genny

customer_reviews.title: Product deteriorated during shipping ??
customer_reviews.text: Product was not like you get in store. I called company about color and consistency They told me it should be white, not clear. It should be a little thicker and not runny. Will not buy it again from Amazon. Not sure if shipping and or storage had any thing to do with it. It was shipped to NV Anyhow, just wanted you to know this product is for a skin condition that needs to be what it calls for.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: From reading the other reviews i thought this would be a good wash for my body since i have body acne , mostly on my back & very little on my chest but i didn’t see much of a difference :/ so i honestly don’t think it’s worth buying it.
customer_reviews.author: karla

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing for people with KP!
customer_reviews.text: I have keratosis Pilaris and it’s made me super insecure when it comes to showing my arms for a long time. Nothing ever worked when it came to getting rid of those annoying bumps. The first time I tried this body wash it helped so much! It cleared at least a quarter of my bumps away after one wash! I’d definitely recommend this to anyone especially those with KP.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Cholewinski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.  It works great and fast
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once with the same lotion. Next day,. My skin so much smoother and softer. Bumps are almost completely gone. This stuff works great on bumpy skin. Just be sure to use the same type lotion by CeraVe. Get great results.
customer_reviews.author: Jill E Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My teenager struggle with back and chest acne- both boys and girl- I bought this based on rating to try and save money and man am I glad I did. I would highly recommend trying this product! It works great!
customer_reviews.author: christi

customer_reviews.title: Good for chest and back acne
customer_reviews.text: I use this for chest and back acne with an exfoliating wash cloth every day faithfully and I now have way lesser break outs, doesn’t really moisture my skin but for me that’s good because my skin is super oily. I definitely recommend using this
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: benzoyl peroxide vs. salicylic acid
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for most, (that’s why 2 stars & not 1), and I thought it was great for me at first. My body started clearing up after the first month but then got A LOT worse. More worse than it’s ever been. Thankfully, I found something to clear it up. If you have the same problem just try a body wash with benzoyl peroxide instead of salicylic acid.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: No difference after a week but keeping it up till I can see results.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a week now. So far I don’t see any less bumpiness skin wise. It does seem gentle though and has been gentle on my skin. I guess I have to see my skin after a few more weeks to say it it works well or not at making my skin more smooth
customer_reviews.author: shalom Lombo

customer_reviews.title: Great Results... Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I saw results within a few days on my arms. As for my legs, the process has taken a bit longer but is worth it. My favorite thing is that it is scentless. A little goes a long way. I think the bottle could easily be a 3 month supply.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana B

customer_reviews.title: CeraVe is an amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I have used it in the shower twice and have already noticed a reduction in the amount of bumps on my arms and legs. I have very sensitive skin and so far it hasn't irritated me. I highly recommend this product. I also use the CerVe lotion when I get out of the shower as well. This is some of the best products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Great for Oily and Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: I started using Cerave face wash on my body and was happy to find this body wash version when I ran out. I tend to have oily skin and have been more prone to body acne. This has cleared up that issue and also alleviated the dry skin I sometimes get. I will keep using this and plan to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Works as well as, if not better than Bumpy Skin Wash
customer_reviews.text: I use this wash a few times a week, the pilaris keratosis is basically gone. I also use a dry brush. (highly recommended for better circulation, cellulite and exfoliation - twice daily whether I shower or not) I use the lotion on sensitive areas and it has made ALL the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ms A. Dema

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love any and everything CeraVe. Give your physical exfoliants a break and use this! I have sensitive skin and eczema so I’m cautious about trying new things. This stuff is fragrance free, moisturizing and gentle enough to use everyday.
customer_reviews.author: SaKmBT

customer_reviews.title: New go-to body wash
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs up! Used it twice so far and it’s definitely making my skin soft and smoothing any bumps. Can’t wait for the long term results 👏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Sunny D

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Help Skin
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t meet any of my expectations. It didn’t help my bumpy skin and using it actually made me get weird pustules on my forearms of all places! It’s just really expensive body wash that I wish I hadn’t bought.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for clearing my body acne!
customer_reviews.text: This body wash has salicylic acid, which was perfect because I had been struggling to get rid of these tiny bumps that were appearing on my back and arms. I used this for about a week and I could already see the difference. Now all I have left to do is fade the scars left behind. If you're struggling with anything similar, I definitely recommend this body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Shammy

customer_reviews.title: Ok ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to treat KP on my legs. I have been using this for a month, I don't see any change. I read so many reviews and people recommended this body wash specifically for KP. I will give a try for another month and will see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for people who have KP
customer_reviews.text: This body wash is a life saver. Last month I couldn't find it anywhere. This product has worked so well with the KP on my legs that I reached out to the company (CeraVe) for more during the month I couldn't find it anywhere. It finally came back into stock - thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D

product_meta.title: CeraVe Body Wash with Salicylic Acid | 10 Ounce | Fragrance Free Body Wash to Exfoliate Rough and Bumpy Skin
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Pack

Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe SA Body Wash for Rough & Bumpy Skin cleanses and exfoliates while helping to restore the protective skin barrier with 3 essential ceramides. This gentle, non-irritating shower body wash helps to exfoliate dead skin cells to improve skin texture without harsh microbeads or grains that can scratch or injure the skin.

 * Fragrance-free
 * Paraben-free
 * Non-comedogenic



Key Ingredients:

 * Salicylic Acid: Gently exfoliates to eliminate dead skin cells
 * MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration
 * Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
 * Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture
 * Niacinamide: Helps repair a compromised skin barrier while improving the appearance of the skin
feature_bullets: [ ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6 II) that help restore and maintain its natural protective barrier
[ PATENTED TECHNOLOGY ] Utilizes patented MVE controlled release technology to help replenish ceramides and deliver long lasting moisturization
[ SKIN SMOOTHING FORMULA ] Salicylic Acid Helps exfoliate and soften essential in smoothing rough skin while Niacinamide calms skin
[ MICRO BEAD FREE ] No harsh microbeads that can irritate skin and damage the environment
[ GENTLE ON SKIN ] Paraben-free, non-comedogenic (won't clog pores), non-drying, non-irritating and fragrance free
